name: High School Simulator Game
description:
Play brand new high school simulator! Stepping into role of new high school girl could be tough, make her first day at school nice and easy. High school girl is nervous on her first day, guide to make her first day at high school life easier and full of fun!!! Help high-school student on her first day at fun high high school simulator game. Assist her in first day of school in finding activities.


The high school activities are interesting. Perform various high school simulator activities like finding, principle and admin office to collect books in this virtually high school simulator game! It features a series of virtual school games to help high school student spend first day of school the best day. In that high school student can withdraw money from ATM machine for tasty school meals and lunch box. Perform computer assignments in computer lab and submit it to mad teacher of high school on time. Participate in dance war and show your super dancer hiphop, dance moves. Race, run and play challenging hurdle race with high school mates.

Features:
Multiple high school activities!
Complete exciting tasks on given time
Advanced ATM machine feature
Addictive gameplay and smooth controls.

Download game and give us your feedback, so we can make more virtual high school games for you.
